dmca.title: hot-tubs.quck.info
dmca.body:
Please note that the website in question does not reside within our
network as of 3:15:21 p.m. (GMT-6) on October 30, 2006.

 

Legal Response Team

The Planet


________________________________

From: Chris Ormiston [mailto:chris@discountspasdirect.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, October 26, 2006 4:51 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: hot-tubs.quck.info
Subject: FW: hot-tubs.quck.info


 

________________________________

From: Ian - DiscountSpasDirect.com [mailto:Ian@DiscountSpasDirect.com] 
Sent: Thursday, October 26, 2006 1:22 AM
To: abuse@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com
Cc: 'Chris Ormiston'; 'Rick Cobb'
Subject: hot-tubs.quck.info



To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please be advised that a customer on your web hosting service,
hot-tubs.quck.info/ ,  is violating many Federal Trademark and Copyright
violations.  We ask that you take immediate action in removing this
account from your servers.

 

As you can see by looking at Google's cache of the page
hot-tubs.quck.info, the user has copied our entire website
www.DiscountSpasDirect.com <http://www.discountspasdirect.com/>
verbatim and cloaked his content.  If you go to the site
http://hot-tubs.quck.info you will see that it redirects you to
http://phvw.com/ which is a random spam directory having nothing to do
with Hot Tubs and Spas.

 

DiscountSpasDirect.com is currently the world's largest hot tub and spa
distributor on the Internet worldwide.  The site http://
hot-tubs.quck.info is costing us tremendous amounts of lost revenue
every minute.

 

Thank you in advance for your cooperation.

 

Ian Rakow

CEO

Ian@DiscountSpasDirect.com

 

Cc: Rick Cobb, atty
